        public Character​(GamePanel gp,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int strength,
                 int hitPoint,
                 int[] characterSet)
        Character constructor method. Sets the name, strength, hit points, and characterSet for the given character. Also sets their attack type and any applied effects.
        Parameters:
        gp - game panel
        name - of the character
        strength - of the character
        hitPoint - of the character
        characterSet - character images

      • loadCharactersImage

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> loadCharactersImage​(java.lang.String filepath,
                                                                             int row,
                                                                             int col)
                                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Load 12 sprite images of a character Each sprite has height 60px, and width 48 px 32 characters, each character has 16 imgs Free assets from https://noiracide.itch.io
        Parameters:
        filepath - File path of the character images
        row - the row position of the character in the images
        col - the col position of the chracter in the images
        Returns:
        An array of 12 sprite images
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception in files

      • applyDamage

        public int applyDamage​(Character target)
        Method to calculate the amount of damage applied. Dmg = Base dmg + weapon dmg If weapon lose durability, Dmg = Base dmg Normal calculation like this is applied to bad guys.
        Parameters:
        target - of either hero or badguy
        Returns:
        quantity damage applied to the target based on the strength and the weapon's attack method.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method will include: 1. Choosing target + apply damage on target 2. Transformation effects 3. On target effects
        Overrides:
        update in class Entity

      • performAttack

        public void performAttack()
        Method to carry out an attack. Chooses the target that will receive the attack. Chooses the attack type based off which hero is being used. Prints out the attack that the hero is performing. Plays sound effects that correspond to the type of attack: normal, special, and special with weapon. Else the character is not a hero and does not have different attack types, sets the hit point of the target as the subtraction of the hitpoint. Separate sound effect is used for the bad guys. Transformation effects are applied to character and target. Update() method is called at the end of the method.
